verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is Love that came for us newline Humbled to a sinner's cross newline You broke my shame and sinfulness newline You rose again victorious

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Faithfulness none can deny newline through the storm and through the fire newline there is truth that sets me free newline Jesus Christ who lives in me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: You are stronger, You are stronger newline Sin is broken, You have saved me newline It is written, Christ is risen newline Jesus, You are Lord of all

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: No beginning and no end newline You're my hope and defense newline You came to seek and save the lost newline You paid it all upon the cross

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: So let Your name be lifted newline Be lifted higher newline Be lifted higher
